column3: In  all  the  above  circumstances,  I  am  of the view that,  complying with the

column2: requirement  of depositing  the  amount  required  as  stipulated,

49(xii)(a), 
is  a  mandatory  requirement 
to  pursue  an  appeal.
Appellants default to deposit as required, warrants a rejection of the Appeal.
Accordingly, the Petition is dismissed without costs.

column3: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
